content: sl 1 purlwise with yarn in front you will need to knit the next 3 sts so that you end up on the p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn side of the toe *do not sl first stitch on very last purl row you will purl it * use kitchener stitch to graft the stitches together repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches on the heel and close the toe have been worked kitchener stitch tutorial https //youtu be/8efxfvznzz8 you will end with a wrong side row and have 12 14 16 sts left now it is time to pick up gusset stitches weave in all ends and enjoy your new pair of socks dk weight vanilla socks // © crazy sock lady designs 3 for help please contact kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com connect with kay keep in contact i love seeing all of y alls works in progress and finished objects if you share your project online make sure to tag me @thecrazysocklady and use the hastag #dkweightvanillasocks instagram @thecrazysocklady to see what i ve been knitting new sock patterns and more youtube channel crazy sock lady to watch weekly episode of my podcast website www crazysockladyco com for more patterns and the crazy sock lady merchandise ravelry crazy sock lady for more patterns knit -a-longs groups discussions and more graphic design pattern layout & design is done by kristen dussault email knldussault@gmail com dk weight vanilla socks // © crazy sock lady designs 4 for help please contact kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com
